Package ch.nolix.core.endPoint2

Class EndPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.bases.ClosableElement
      • ch.nolix.core.endPoint2.EndPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISender, Closable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalEndPoint, NetEndPoint

    public abstract class EndPoint
extends ClosableElement
implements ISender
    An end point can send messages to an other end point of the same type. An end point is abortable.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
